description: Among those convicted were a 14-year-old schoolgirl and a man sent to a German labour camp.
title: Jersey Occupation-era political prisoner records released
title_page: Jersey Occupation-era political prisoner records released - BBC News
maintext: Linda Romeril from Jersey Heritage said: "It is fitting that in this significant year the Political Prisoner's Register from HM Prison is one of the documents that has been opened to the public."
